How many people are affected by Jervell and Lange-Nielsen syndrome ?,"Jervell and Lange-Nielsen syndrome is uncommon; it affects an estimated 1.6 to 6 per 1 million people worldwide. This condition has a higher prevalence in Denmark, where it affects at least 1 in 200,000 people.",GHR,Jervell and Lange-Nielsen syndrome
